Name: La Stego
Review Text: Dont go. This place is horrible.  Vegetables and salad are frozen food. Meat is cheap quality. Mushroom sauce is powder with water.  Like seriously guys revieuw your dishes this is only profit making and screw tourists screw the people right? What a shame even your mothers wont eat there

Name: La Stego
Review Text: The food was delicious, we order ribs and lamb chops which came with a side salad and rice. The rice was amazing and the source that came with it. However i think we over paid for the plate of food even thou we enjoyed it. I will recommend if you gave extra money to spend if not there are other alternatives around the the street.

Name: La Stego
Review Text:
(12/3)
We chose two special dishes -- steak & ribs, which tasted quite good. The store has a comfortable environment and the music on the day is also very good.

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Environment is not perfect, staff talks english, polish, french, dutch and although it is place for tourists food is perfect. We order steak ( medium ) and ribs they was delicious. Do not forget to order draft beer for dessert :)

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Amazing service and amazing food! The cheeseburger is to Die for and the people who work here are super nice, overall 5/5 service

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Tastes more like fast food. The steaks are ok but fries are not fresh, not home made. It's difficult to find a real Argentinian restaurant in Amsterdam. They're not Argentinians.

Name: La Stego

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Tourist trap. We had to pay 10 EUR for the bread that we did not order. Waiter replied that he had asked for bread which was not true. Better watch out and stay away. The smell was also horrible. We could smell some chlorine used for cleaning the toilet in the whole restaurant.

Name: La Stego

Name: La Stego
Review Text: We went to this restaurant twice in a four day trip to Amsterdam in February.  Fillet steaks to die for, highly recommend their onion rings.  Family run business who are battling the big chains.  Waiters were lovely and fun.

Name: La Stego

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Good food...that's all the good thing about this place. On the other side, bored and non- patient waiter,sick'n tired attitude all the time,made us feel totally unwelcomed,the prices on the menu inside are different than the ones written outside.

Name: La Stego
Review Text: We stopped here for dinner, I ordered steak, it was cooked perfectly, the restaurant had a good atmosphere, the toilets are on the second floor up some steep steps. Overall a good experience.

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Food was quite good. According to my father in law you have to go to a very expensive restaurant in the States to get a steak that good. Atmosphere is ok. It is rather amateuristic though: mayonaise in sachets, for example.

Name: La Stego
Review Text: Mediocre food, terrible prices. They also charged for sauces and salt and pepper, which would have been fine had I known.

Name: La Stego
Review Text: I chanced this little restaurant and was really surprised... I had the Bife de Lomo 300Gr and it was really up in the top 5 steaks I have ever had... and I have been all through Sth America... I would definitely recommend trying this great little restaurant out. More than meets the eye
